short_description: tktx is a pharmaceutical products supplier based in guangzhou, china.
long_description: our company ensures that all products are produced, stored, marketed, and shipped with the highest quality and efficiency. our factory began operations in 1996 and is currently located in china, facilitating global logistics with great agility and security. our experienced team is dedicated to meeting your needs and providing exceptional support from purchase to delivery. in the 1980s, china implemented economic reforms that propelled its growth, making it one of the global leaders in economic development. the resulting economic growth significantly improved the quality of life for the population, also stimulating interest in emerging cultural trends. by the late 1990s, we identified a growing demand for tattoos and recognized a business opportunity. this led us to start producing tktx anesthetic creams and marketing them in hong kong. carefully selected for their exceptional effectiveness and reliability, they're perfect for pain relief during tattoos , laser hair removal , and cosmetic procedures.
